all you gotta do is describe your schema and a powerful GraphQL API will be automatically generated for you. With this mode of development, you can go from ideating to writing schema to having a working GraphQL API ready in just a few minutes.

is a battle-tested content platform. It comes built-in with a powerful Rich Text Editor that lets you manage content on the fly. The editor is tightly integrated with your data model and can be customised to include your own components.
